Class ProductSingleton

java.lang.Object
th.ac.npru.se.bl.product.ProductSingleton
All Implemented Interfaces:
Manageble
public class ProductSingleton extends Object implements Manageble
The ProductSingleton class implements a singleton pattern for managing product data. It provides methods to set product details, show the product, insert product into database, and fetch product name by ID from the database.

This class assumes a MySQL database with a table named Product with fields matching p_id, p_name, and p_price.

    • insertProduct

      public void insertProduct()
      Inserts the current product into the database. Connects to a MySQL database named testing using root credentials. Assumes the Product table exists with appropriate columns.

    • getProductName

      public String getProductName(String pid)
      Retrieves the product name for a given product ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      pid - the product ID
      Returns:
      the product name associated with the given ID, or an empty string if not found

    • deleteById

      public boolean deleteById(int id)
      Deletes a product by its ID. This implementation currently always returns false and is not implemented.
      Specified by:
      deleteById in interface Manageble
      Parameters:
      id - the product ID
      Returns:
      false (not implemented)
